methodBasic: Cook <protein> in a pan, add pasta sauce, serve with cooked <carb>.
methodDetailed: Brown the <protein> in a large pan over medium heat. Stir in the pasta sauce and simmer for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, cook the <carb> in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain and serve topped with the sauce.

methodBasic: Cook <protein> and <carb>, mix with sauce, top with cheese, bake until golden.
Mix <protein> with cooked <carb> and creamy sauce, bake until bubbling.

Cook <protein> and assorted <veg>. Serve over <carb> with sauce and fried egg.
Cook <protein>, add butter chicken sauce, simmer, serve with <carb>.
Cook <protein>, add honey mustard sauce, serve with <carb>.
Cook <protein>, add honey soy sauce, toss with <carb>.
Cook <protein> with veg, top with mashed <carb>, bake until golden.
Cook <protein>, serve with mashed <carb> and steamed <veg>.
